mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where user_id = #{user_id}

select r.res_date,p.class_name, s.program_time, r.count, r.status, s.class_no from tbl_reservation r, tbl_program p , tbl_program_sub s where r.class_sub_no = s.program_sub_no and s.class_no = p.class_no and r.user_id = #{user_id}
